Products

Paletón de cajeta

A true childhood classic. A perfect, pocket-sized treat with all the flavor of our original cajeta recipe in a lollipop to enjoy anytime and anywhere. A great way to sweeten your lunch break.

Classic Cajeta

The original caramel sauce or “Cajeta” made with real goat milk and a subtle Dulce de Leche taste, an extraordinary consistency and silky texture to turn any simple or challenge.
